checks.name: Project & Usage Alignment
checks.notes:
AI experiment management of logs and metrics. Aligns with the approved research topic Datascience and engineering.

Weights & Biases (wandb) was requested but due to no-internet policy on Shaheen III, MLFlow as an alternative to do local logging and metric collection will be proposed to the applicants.
